action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image shows a city street scene with traffic lights, cars, and a cyclist. There are buildings on both sides of the street, and a green bike lane in the center. A street sign reads "Georgia St." There are trees lining the left side of the street and a "Parking" sign on the right side. The traffic lights are red.

Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image shows a cluttered room with various electronic devices and items scattered around. There is a computer monitor displaying a grid of images, a keyboard, and a mouse on a small table. Another monitor is mounted on the wall, showing a different screen. There are boxes, papers, and other miscellaneous items on the floor and surrounding area. The room has pink curtains and a window.

This is my DESCRIPTION: The image shows a city street scene with traffic lights, cars, and a cyclist. There are buildings on both sides of the street, and a green bike lane in the center. A street sign reads "Georgia St." There are trees lining the left side of the street and a "Parking" sign on the right side. The traffic lights are red.

QUESTION: Are there any people visible in your image?

There are boxes, papers, and other miscellaneous items on the floor and surrounding area. The room has pink curtains and a window.
